Posts.Content:
Hi,
My mom was lost to breast cancer at 54.
I went for a mammogram yesterday and they found something in my right breast.
They are going to do a ultrasound and a 3d mammogram.
I am very stressed.
 Jacky
Posts.Title: Bad Mammogram

Posts.Content:
Thanks Everyone,
I go tomorrow at 3.
Colon cancer runs in my family.
